矇在鼓裡.definition: variant of 蒙在鼓裡|蒙在鼓里[meng2 zai4 gu3 li3]

矇混.definition: to deceive; to hoodwink; Taiwan pr. [meng1 hun4]

矇混過關.definition: to get away with it; to slip through; to bluff one's way out; Taiwan pr. [meng1 hun4 guo4 guan1]

矇矇亮.definition: dawn; the first glimmer of light

矇頭轉向.definition: to lose one's bearings; utterly confused

矇騙.definition: to hoodwink; to deceive; to dupe sb
